Before you officially launch, you need to make assestment of how well you can transform investments into profits.
What is the financial metric that tracks profit relative to shareholder's equity?
ROE P/E ROI

Well done, IÃ±aki.

That is correct!

That is not correct, IÃ±aki.

The right answer was ROE

ROE
The Return on Equity metric tracks profit relative to shareholder's equity, as opposed to Price-to-earning ratio (P/E) or Return on investment (ROI)
